name: HBCU Enrollment
content:
Description: Data on Fall enrollment in degree-granting historically Black colleges and universities (HBCU).

[Source](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/blob/master/data/2021/2021-02-02/readme.md) and original data [source](https://data.world/nces)

Columns:

 * Year (numerical): Year data comes from
 * Total Enrollment (numerical): Total enrollment across all types of HBCUs
 * Males (numerical): Male enrollment across all types of HBCUs
 * Females (numerical): Female enrollment across all types of HBCUs
 * 4-year (numerical): 4 year HBCU enrollment
 * 2-year (numerical): 4 year HBCU enrollment
 * Total - Public (numerical): Total public HBCU enrollment
 * 4-year - Public (numerical): 4 year public HBCU enrollment
 * 2-year - Public (numerical): 2 year public HBCU enrollment
 * Total - Private (numerical): Total private HBCU enrollment
 * 4-year - Private (numerical): 4 year private HBCU enrollment
 * 2-year - Private (numerical): 2 year private HBCU enrollment
